title: Inferior Doll
sinopse:
Glow falls in love with a beautiful female android from a shop window display. Working hard for the money, he eventually buys the Android. However, when he starts it up it transforms into a big manâ€¦ Powerful Sex Android. What happens to Glow when Deep pushes him?

(Source: Blissful Sin)

Included one-shot: Cloudy Heart
